home.description: Offer your friends the opportunity to discover exceptional products, thanks to our group orders. Benefit from preferential rates, but also enjoy together the richness and authenticity of our terroirs.

layout.text: Savor the delights of local crafts together, in three simple steps
layout.text2: By creating an attractive ad where you define the price, give details of the products offered and introduce the artisan. All the information your potential buyers need.
layout.text4: Encourage them to explore the offer and place an order, all facilitated by an online platform. This is an opportunity to introduce them to new products.
layout.text6: This includes the preparation of the packages by the artisan and their delivery to you. Make sure that your friends receive the products under the best conditions.

header.text: Create, Share and Enjoy with a bulk order!
header.text1: In just a few clicks, create an order, invite your friends and share the pleasure of discovering together the unique flavors of local crafts. Take advantage of advantageous prices, support artisans in your region, and transform each purchase into a friendly and enriching experience.

breakpoint.text1: Embark on the adventure of artisanal flavors
breakpoint.text2: By joining our group order community, benefit from advantageous prices while sharing the pleasure of tasting the best of local crafts. Make each purchase a unique experience, supporting artisans and sharing moments with your friends.
breakpoint.text4: An enriching social experience, strengthening bonds with family and friends while discovering exceptional products together.
breakpoint.text5: Support and promotion of local artisans
breakpoint.text6: By favoring products from local crafts, you contribute to maintaining and promoting the unique know-how of our regions.

faq.text: You will find answers to the most common questions regarding our bulk ordering platform for artisan products.
faq.que1: How does bulk ordering work on your platform?
faq.que3: How do I invite my friends to join a group order?
faq.que4: How is the price of products calculated?
faq.ans1: This is a detailed answer for the first question.
faq.ans2: This is a detailed answer for the second question.
faq.ans3: This is a detailed answer for the third question.
faq.ans4: This is a detailed answer for the fourth question.
faq.ans5: This is a detailed answer for the fifth question.

about_us.values_description: By joining our group order community, you benefit from advantageous prices while sharing the pleasure of tasting the best of local crafts. Make each purchase a unique experience, supporting artisans and sharing moments with your friends.
about_us.shared_experience_description: An enriching social experience, strengthening bonds with family and friends while discovering exceptional products together.
about_us.local_support: Support and promotion of local artisans
about_us.local_support_description: By favoring products from local crafts, you contribute to maintaining and promoting the unique know-how of our regions.
about_us.authenticity_description: Products that tell a story, that of our terroirs and their passionate artisans.
about_us.community_description: We believe in the power of sharing and friendly experiences. Each bulk order is an opportunity to strengthen ties with your friends and family.
about_us.local_support_heading_description: You participate in promoting and maintaining the unique know-how of our regions. Each purchase is a gesture of support for our artisans.
about_us.unique_products_description: Each artisan is selected for the quality and authenticity of their products. You will discover flavors and creations that you will not find anywhere else.
about_us.advantageous_prices_description: Thanks to bulk orders, you benefit from preferential rates. The more the merrier!
about_us.enriching_experience_description: Ordering on The Good Deals is much more than a simple purchase. This is an opportunity to share precious moments with your friends while supporting a local and sustainable economy.
about_us.welcome_description: We are delighted to welcome you to our community dedicated to discovering exceptional products at affordable prices.. The Good Deals is above all a human and gourmet adventure, where each group order becomes a celebration of local flavors and know-how.
about_us.mission_description: Allow you to benefit from the best artisans in our regions and allow you to share their treasures with your friends. By joining forces, we make exceptional products accessible to all, while supporting local talent.
about_us.join_adventure: Join us on this great adventure!
about_us.join_adventure_description: Creating an order is as simple as it is user-friendly. In just a few clicks, launch an ad, invite your friends and enjoy the delights of local crafts together.

how_it_works.title: How it works?
how_it_works.description: We know that you can't wait to discover and share exceptional products with your friends. That's why we've made the process as simple and enjoyable as possible.

layout.text: Savor the delights of local crafts together, in three simple steps
layout.text2: Start by creating an attractive ad in just a few clicks. Define the price, describe the products offered and present the craftsman behind these wonders. Make sure to include all the essential information to captivate your future buyers.
layout.text4: Once your ad is ready, it’s time to invite your friends and family to check out the offer. Use our online platform to send invitations and share the announcement via social media or email. The more of you there are, the more advantageous rates you will be able to benefit from!
layout.text6: After collecting all the orders, the craftsman prepares the packages and ships them directly to your home. We ensure that delivery takes place in the best conditions so that your friends receive their products in perfect condition, ready to be enjoyed.

header.text1: In just a few steps, you can turn a purchase into a friendly and rewarding experience. Create an ad, invite your friends and enjoy the delights of local crafts together.
header.ready_to_get_started_description: Join our community and place your first bulk order today. If you have any questions or need assistance, our team is here to support you every step.

breakpoint.text4: Each product is selected for its authenticity and exceptional quality.
breakpoint.text6: Thanks to bulk orders, benefit from preferential prices.
breakpoint.text8: Share unique moments with your friends while supporting artisans in your region.

footer.general_conditions: General Conditions of Sales and Use

contact_us.title: FAQs
contact_us.description: You will find answers to the most common questions regarding our bulk ordering platform for artisanal products.
contact_us.contact_us: Contact us, we are here to help you!
contact_us.other_questions_description: If you have any further questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to accompany you on this wonderful adventure of discovery and sharing!

faq_1.question: How does bulk ordering work on your platform?
faq_1.answer: Our platform allows you to create ads for artisanal products, invite friends to participate, and easily manage orders and deliveries.

faq_2.question: Who are the partner artisans?
faq_2.answer: We collaborate with passionate local artisans who are rigorously selected for the quality and authenticity of their products. Each of them has a unique story to tell through their creations.

faq_3.question: How do I invite my friends to join a group order?
faq_3.answer: Once your ad is created, you can invite your friends and family by sharing a link via email or on social media. Our platform makes this process easy in just a few clicks.

faq_4.question: How is the price of products calculated?
faq_4.answer: The price of the products is set by the artisans and may vary depending on the size of the bulk order. The higher the number of participants, the more advantageous the price per product can be.

faq_5.question: How does delivery work?
faq_5.answer: The craftsmen prepare and ship the packages directly to the address of your choice. We ensure that delivery goes smoothly so that the products arrive in perfect condition.

faq_6.question: What is the delivery delay?
faq_6.answer: The delivery time depends on each craftsman and the location of your address. Generally, you can expect to receive your products within 5-7 business days after the bulk order is placed.

faq_7.question: Can I track my order?
faq_7.answer: Yes, once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number to follow the delivery progress in real time.

faq_8.question: What happens if I have a problem with my order?
faq_8.answer: If you have a problem with your order, our customer service team is on hand to help you resolve it quickly. Contact us via our contact form or by phone.

faq_9.question: Is there a minimum amount for bulk orders?
faq_9.answer: Minimum amount for bulk orders may vary depending on products and artisans. Details are specified in each ad.

faq_10.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_10.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). All payments are secure.

faq_11.question: How can I cancel or modify my order?
faq_11.answer: To cancel or change an order, please contact us as soon as possible. If the order has not yet been processed, we will do our best to accommodate your request.

faq_12.question: Can I return products?
faq_12.answer: Given the handmade nature of our products, returns are generally only accepted in the event of defective or damaged product. Please see our returns policy for full details.

faq_13.question: How can I become an artisan partner?
faq_13.answer: If you are a tradesman interested in our platform, we would be delighted to speak with you. Contact us via our contact form mentioning your interest in becoming a partner.

GeneralConditions.heading: General Conditions of Sale and Use of thegood.deals
GeneralConditions.introduction: Welcome to thegood.deals, a marketplace platform dedicated to transactions between professional sellers and private consumers (B2C). These General Terms and Conditions of Sale (hereinafter 'GTC') govern the rights and obligations of users of our marketplace. By accessing and using our site, you accept these GTC in full.

content.thegoodDeals: thegood.deals: The website and marketplace platform operated by thegood.deals SAS accessible at www.thegood.deals.
content.user: User: Any person accessing the marketplace, whether visitors, sellers, or buyers.
content.seller: Seller: Any natural person registered on the marketplace offering products for sale. The seller acts as an organizer.
content.buyer: Buyer: Any natural person acting as a consumer and placing an order on the site.
content.product: Product: Any good or service offered for sale by sellers on the marketplace.

section_2.title: 2. Purpose of the T&Cs
section_2.content: These T&Cs define the conditions under which thegood.deals enables the connection between sellers and buyers. thegood.deals does not intervene in the transaction itself between the seller and the buyer, except for facilitating payments via its platform.

section_3.title: 3. Access to the Marketplace
content: Access to thegood.deals is free for users.
Registration is mandatory for sellers wishing to offer their products and for buyers wishing to place an order.

section_4.title: 4. Registration and Accounts
content: To use thegood.deals services, sellers and buyers must register by providing truthful and up-to-date information.
Each user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their credentials and must immediately notify thegood.deals in the event of loss or unauthorized use of their account.

section_5.title: 5. Role of thegood.deals
content: thegood.deals acts solely as a technical intermediary providing a platform for connecting buyers and sellers.
thegood.deals is not a party to the sales contract between the seller and the buyer and does not guarantee the quality of the products or services sold.

section_6.title: 6. Obligations of the Seller
content: The seller undertakes to offer products that comply with the laws and regulations in force, particularly consumer protection rules.
Sellers are responsible for their product descriptions, prices, and availability on the platform.

section_7.title: 7. Order Process
content: Buyers place orders directly with sellers through the thegood.deals platform.
Buyers receive order summaries and confirmation emails after validating their purchase.

section_8.title: 8. Payment
content: thegood.deals provides a secure payment solution for transactions.
Payments can be made by bank card, e-wallet, or any other means available on the platform.
thegood.deals retains a commission on each sale.

section_9.title: 9. Delivery
content: Delivery of the products is provided by the seller or by a transport provider chosen by the seller.
Delivery times are mentioned when ordering, and the seller is responsible for respecting these times.

section_10.title: 10. Right of Withdrawal
content: In accordance with legal provisions, the buyer has a period of 14 days from receipt of the product to exercise their right of withdrawal.

section_11.title: 11. Legal Guarantees
content: The seller is bound by legal guarantees of conformity and hidden defects.

section_12.title: 12. Liability
content: thegood.deals assumes no responsibility for disputes between buyers and sellers.
It cannot be held responsible for errors, omissions, or delays in product deliveries.

section_13.title: 13. Dispute Resolution
content: In the event of a dispute, users should seek an amicable solution.
If no resolution is found, buyers may contact a consumer association or the competent court.
thegood.deals also offers mediation services.

section_14.title: 14. Intellectual Property
content: All content on thegood.deals is the exclusive property of thegood.deals or its sellers.
Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

section_15.title: 15. Protection of Personal Data
content: thegood.deals complies with current legislation regarding the protection of personal data.
Users have the right to access, rectify, or delete their personal information.

section_16.title: 16. Modification of the T&Cs
content: thegood.deals reserves the right to modify these T&Cs at any time, with changes taking effect immediately upon posting.
Continued use of the platform implies acceptance of these updates.

section_17.title: 17. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section_17.content: These T&Cs are governed by French law, and disputes will be resolved according to the legal provisions applicable to buyers and sellers' domiciles.

section_18.title: 18. Contact
section_18.content: For any questions or complaints regarding these T&Cs, please contact us at: support@thegood.deals.

copyright.description2: No systematic extraction or reuse of any part of the content of thegood.deals is permitted without our express written consent. In particular, the use of search and data mining tools or robots for the extraction (on one or more occasions) of substantial portions of thegood.deals services is prohibited without our express written consent. You are also not permitted to create or publish your own databases when they contain substantial portions of thegood.deals (e.g. our product lists and price lists) without our express written consent.

trademarks.title: Trademarks
trademarks.description1: thegood.deals® is a registered trademark of thegood.deals. In addition, the graphics, logos, page headers, button icons, scripts, and service names that are included in or available through the thegood.deals website are trademarks or trade dress of thegood.deals.
trademarks.description2: The trademarks and trade dress of thegood.deals may not be used to represent any product or service that is not thegood.deals’s, or in any manner that is likely to cause confusion among users or disparage or discredit thegood.deals. items: Our service providers: Those involved in the management of the Site...

Business partners: With your consent, for sending promotions or third-party offers.

dataStorage.title: 6. Data Storage Duration
items: For the performance of a contract: for the time necessary to manage your order and customer relations.
For marketing communications: until you withdraw your consent.
For compliance with legal obligations: for the duration imposed by applicable law.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights over your personal data:
items: Access: You can request access to the personal data we hold about you.
Rectification: You can request to correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
Deletion: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data in certain cases...
Objection: You can object to the processing of your data for legitimate reasons...
Limitation: You can request that the processing of your data be limited in certain cases...
Portability: You can request to receive a copy of your personal data in a structured...
yourRights.contact: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at the following email address: bonjour@thegood.deals

useOfCookies.title: 8. Use of Cookies
useOfCookies.content: A cookie is a small file stored on your device when you visit our Site. We use cookies for the following purposes:
items: Improve navigation on the Site: Personalize content, remember your preferences...
Analyze traffic: We use tools such as Google Analytics to collect anonymous information...
Targeted Advertising: Advertising cookies may be used to display ads tailored to your interests.

dataSecurity.title: 9. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement all appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration...

policyChanges.title: 10. Changes to the Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: This Privacy Policy may be amended periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal developments...

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, you can contact us at bonjour@thegood.deals.

orders.empty: You don't have any orders now.
orders.order_cancelled: Your order has been cancelled successfully.

requestSent.heading: It’s sent! 🎉
requestSent.description: Your request has been sent to the organiser. You will be notified when the organiser accepts or refuses your request.

artisanApproved.heading: Deal Confirmed
artisanApproved.description: The artisan has approved your deal. You can now proceed to finalize the payment.

deleteAccount.heading: It's deleted! 🗑️
deleteAccount.description:
This is just goodbye!
Come back whenever you want.

artisanRefused.heading: Deal Refused
artisanRefused.description: The artisan has refused your deal. You can try creating a new one or contact support for more help.

lostPassword.checkEmailDesc: A password reset link has been sent to your email address.

resetPassword.resetDesc: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.

helpRequest.sentDescription: Our team will respond to you within 48 hours maximum.

inviteLovedOnes.share_description: Share your deal with your friends and family to get more orders.

deal_wallet.title: Deal wallet
deal_wallet.info_text: We will verify the participants' payments, before settling the deal owed to the artisan.

message.part1: If you do not have a Stripe account, you will be redirected to create a Stripe account to collect the payment at the end of the deal in accordance with

payment_verification_info.title: You will be charged 0€, which is perfectly normal.
payment_verification_info.description: This operation simply serves to verify your payment method and incurs no fees.
